I suggest Google :) Installed 9.1 by mistake, but successfully installed 9.0 after, GL m8

On Mon, 2 Apr 2018, 22:36 Leo, ***@***.***> wrote: @2101199 <https://github.com/21011996> , is there any trick to uninstall cuda 9.1 and reinstall cuda 9.0 ? I went in the uninstaller control pannel window on windows 10 to uninstall all cuda 9.1 components. but now the cuda 9.0 installation keep failing even after reboot. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
I suggest Google :) Installed 9.1 by mistake, but successfully installed
9.0 after, GL m8

On Mon, 2 Apr 2018, 22:36 Leo, <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> cuda 9.1 and reinstall cuda 9.0 ? I went in the uninstaller control pannel
> window on windows 10 to uninstall all cuda 9.1 components. but now the cuda
> 9.0 installation keep failing even after reboot.
